title: Limits on Disclosure of Financial Information
content:
Limits on Disclosure of Financial Information

State Regulations
§ 420.10 - Limits on disclosure of nonpublic personal financial information to nonaffiliated third parties
§ 420.11 - Limits on redisclosure and reuse of nonpublic personal financial information
§ 420.12 - Limits on sharing policy number information for marketing purposes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
